Devianz's Simple Compiler client.java:12494: ')' expected sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Please Use ": :giveitem #### PLAYERNAME"!"); ^

client.java:12494: illegal character: \35

:giveitem #### PLAYERNAME”!”);

:giveitem #### PLAYERNAME”!”);

^

:giveitem #### PLAYERNAME”!”);

:giveitem #### PLAYERNAME”!”);

:giveitem #### PLAYERNAME”!”);

           ^

:giveitem #### PLAYERNAME”!”);

item.title: Giveitem Command 2nd release (Dodian, Silab, Original)
item.dc:creator: @A.E.M A.E.M.
item.description:
@A.E.M wrote:

I am nice so im releasing this

Dodian:

Use as ::giveitem 20 20 PLAYERNAME.

if (command.startsWith("giveitem") && (playerRights > 1)) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if (args.length == 4) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmor00) && (newItemID >= 0)) { c.addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); c.sendMessage(playerName + " Just gave you Item ID: " + newItemID); sendMessac.playerName + " Item ID: " + newItemID +" Amount: " + newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } else { sendMessage("Use as '::giveitem 21 10 alex'!"); } }

Original:

Use as ::giveitem #### PLAYERNAME.

if (command.startsWith("giveitem")) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(9,13)); String er.parseInt(command.substring(14)); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; if (newItemID >= 0) { c.addItem(n a item. ITEMID: " + newItemID); sendMessage(c.playerName + " Recieved your item. ITEMID: " + newItemID); PlayerHandler.messageToAll(playerName + " Has Given "+ c.playerName + " Item ID: " + newItemID +""); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Please Use ::giveitem #### PLAYERNAME!"); }

Silab:

Use as ::giveitem ##### PLAYERNAME.

if (command.startsWith("giveitem")) { try { int newItemmand.substring(9,14)); String name = Integer.parseInt(command.subs)); client c ndler.getPlayerID(name)]; if (newItemID >= 0) { c.addItem(newItemID, 1); c.sendMessage(playerName + " Gave you a item. IT + newItemID); sendMITEMID: " + newItemID); PlayerHandler.messageToAll(playerName + " Has Given "+ c.playerName + " Item ID: " + newItemID +""); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Please Use ::giveitem ##### PLAYERNAME!"); }
